entry.title: WIND WARNING , Qualicum Beach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:09 PM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Qualicum Beach Airport 01:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
Temperature: 5.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Dewpoint: 2.3°C
Wind: S 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this evening except 40 near the Strait of Georgia. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon then increasing to 50 gusting to 70. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late in the evening. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023
